step.cmd: Drive northwest on US-460 BUS W/N Franklin St. toward marvin Jarels Cir NE.
Continue to follow US-460 BUS W for 2 miles.
Take the ramp into US-460 W.
Continue to follow US-460 W for 6 miles.
Exit onto VA-412 N/Prices Fork Rd. toward Downtown Blacksburg.
Turn right onto Turner St. SW.
Follow Turner St. past McDonald's, Substation, and Zaxby's.
Follow the signs and directions posted along the street and parking lots to park in the Perry St. parking garage.
Walk East from the parking garage toward Barger St.
Make a slight right onto campus grounds and Shanks Hall will be right in front of you and its official univeristy-issued sign will be visible.
